zh-cn: 罗伯特·方济各·普雷沃斯特

description.zh-cn: 天主教会第267任教宗，拥有美国和秘鲁双重国籍，是首位北美洲及圣奥斯定会出身的教宗。他选择“良”作为教宗名号是为了致敬开启天主教社会思想的教宗良十三世。
description.en: The 267th Pope of the Catholic Church, holding dual American and Peruvian citizenship, and the first pope from North America and the Order of Saint Augustine. He chose the pontifical name 'Leo' in honor of Pope Leo XIII, who initiated Catholic social teaching.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会第266任教宗，良十四世的前任。
description.en: The 266th Pope of the Catholic Church, predecessor of Leo XIV.

description.zh-cn: 一个天主教托钵修会，良十四世是该会会士。
description.en: A Catholic mendicant order, of which Pope Leo XIV is a member.

en: Pontifical University of Saint Thomas Aquinas

description.zh-cn: 罗马教廷的一个部门，负责监督主教的任命。
description.en: A dicastery of the Roman Curia that oversees the appointment of bishops.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会第256任教宗，因于1891年发表《新事》通谕开启了天主教社会思想而闻名。
description.en: The 256th Pope of the Catholic Church, known for initiating Catholic social teaching with his 1891 encyclical 'Rerum novarum'.

description.zh-cn: 教宗良十三世于1891年发表的通谕，被视为天主教社会思想的起点。
description.en: An encyclical issued by Pope Leo XIII in 1891, considered the starting point of Catholic social teaching.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰总统。
description.en: President of Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌性侵未成年人而被暂停圣职的圣奥斯定会神父。
description.en: An Augustinian priest who was suspended from public ministry due to allegations of sexual abuse of minors.

nodes.id: 受神父虐待幸存者网络

zh-cn: 受神父虐待幸存者网络
en: Survivors Network of those Abused by Priests

description.zh-cn: 神职人员性虐待幸存者的权益倡导团体。
description.en: An advocacy group for survivors of sexual abuse by clergy.

description.zh-cn: 天主教香港教区主教、枢机。
description.en: Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Hong Kong and a Cardinal.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国副总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the Vice President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 正式任命普雷沃斯特为奇克拉约主教。
description.en: Formally appointed Prevost as the Bishop of Chiclayo.

description.zh-cn: 任命普雷沃斯特为罗马教廷主教部部长。
description.en: Appointed Prevost as the Prefect of the Dicastery for Bishops of the Roman Curia.

description.zh-cn: 在枢机会议上将普雷沃斯特擢升为枢机。
description.en: Elevated Prevost to the rank of Cardinal at a consistory.

description.zh-cn: 在第四轮投票中将普雷沃斯特枢机选举为教宗。
description.en: Elected Cardinal Prevost as Pope in the fourth round of voting.

description.zh-cn: 接替方济各成为天主教会第267任教宗。
description.en: Succeeded Pope Francis as the 267th Pope of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 良十四世选择“良”作为教宗名号，是受先教宗良十三世及其社会思想的启发。
description.en: Leo XIV's choice of the pontifical name 'Leo' was inspired by his predecessor Pope Leo XIII and his social teachings.

description.zh-cn: 良十三世于1891年发表的《新事》通谕开启了天主教社会思想。
description.en: The 1891 encyclical 'Rerum novarum' by Pope Leo XIII initiated Catholic social teaching.

description.zh-cn: 良十四世选择其教宗名号意在致敬开启天主教社会思想的良十三世，并关注当代社会议题。
description.en: Leo XIV's choice of papal name was a tribute to Leo XIII, who initiated Catholic social teaching, and reflects a focus on contemporary social issues.

description.zh-cn: 在担任主教期间及当选教宗后，多次谴责俄罗斯的入侵行径，称其为“真正的帝国主义式的入侵”，并呼吁公正持久的和平。
description.en: Both as a bishop and after his election as Pope, he repeatedly condemned Russia's invasion, calling it a 'truly imperialist invasion' and urging for a just and lasting peace.

description.zh-cn: 与乌克兰总统泽连斯基通话，这是他当选教宗后首次与世俗国家领导人通话。
description.en: Spoke with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy by phone, marking his first conversation with a secular head of state since his election.

description.zh-cn: 在担任圣奥斯定会芝加哥会省省会长期间，允许被控性侵的神父雅各伯·雷入住修道院，此事引发了争议。
description.en: While serving as Provincial Superior of the Augustinian Province of Chicago, he permitted Father James Ray, who was accused of sexual abuse, to reside in a friary, which caused controversy.

relationships.source: 受神父虐待幸存者网络

description.zh-cn: 批评普雷沃斯特在处理神职人员性虐待指控中的做法，认为其未能对长期存在的指控采取行动。
description.en: Criticized Prevost's handling of sexual abuse allegations against clergy, accusing him of failing to act on long-standing accusations.

description.zh-cn: 周守仁枢机透露，良十四世曾表示希望访问中国，并且是首位就任前曾到访中国内地的教宗。
description.en: Cardinal Stephen Chow revealed that Pope Leo XIV had expressed a desire to visit China and was the first pope to have visited mainland China before his pontificate.

description.zh-cn: 据香港主教周守仁透露，良十四世在就任教宗前曾访问过中国内地。
description.en: According to Hong Kong Bishop Stephen Chow, Leo XIV had visited mainland China before his pontificate.

description.zh-cn: 批评特朗普领导下的美国移民政策。
description.en: Criticized the US immigration policies under the leadership of Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 批评万斯领导下的美国移民政策。
description.en: Criticized the US immigration policies under the leadership of JD Vance.
